reviewText:
Well, I bought this set because the description gives the language options as English, German, Hindi, and Punjabi and I really wanted the Hindi soundtrack to practice my language learning with.

Unfortunately, it does not have a Hindi soundtrack.  Like most DVDS, the languages are English, French, or Spanish.  That's it.

However, I did buy it from one of the third party sellers, so there's a slim chance it was a different product, though the cover looks the same and it's the same grouping of movies.
